name: Everyrealm Arcade: The Atari Cup Championship Rewards & Collectibles

metadata.name: Centipede® World Champion Trophy
metadata.description:
One-of-a-kind trophy reserved for The Atari Cup’s #1 bug blaster. 

Whether you just started squashing the competition, or you’ve been pickin’ off ‘pedes since 1981, pest control never looked so spotless…

Commemorating 50 years of Atari adventures—and perhaps the occasional insect-induced misadventure—this is awarded to the #1 player in The Atari Cup: Centipede Championship. 

Learn more about the Everyrealm Arcade at arcade.everyrealm.com.
